title: As Other Global Crises Collide, Nations Converge to Address Climate Change
description: The United States will try to reassert global leadership at global talks in Egypt.
dc:creator: Lisa Friedman
category: 27th Conference of the Parties of the UNFCCC (COP27)
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: COP27, the next United Nations climate summit, begins in Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt, on Sunday.
